property.name: displayHeader
property.description-key: Whether to display the header of the data grid

property.name: headerText
property.description-key: The text displayed as the header of the data grid

property.name: displaySearch
property.description-key: Enables or disables the display of a search input

property.name: emptyMessage
property.description-key: The message shown when no records are available

property.name: filterDisplayType
property.description-key: Determines how filters are displayed (e.g., menu or row)

property.name: defaultRows
property.description-key: The number of rows displayed by default

property.name: selectionMode
property.description-key: Specifies the selection mode (e.g., single or multiple)

property.name: allowSorting
property.description-key: Enables or disables sorting on columns

property.name: allowFiltering
property.description-key: Enables or disables filtering on columns

property.name: enabled
property.description-key: Enables or disables the Data Grid
